{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = SeeedStudio_BeagleBone_Green |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = SeeedStudio |model = BeagleBone |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Green |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;Sitara AM3358;(AM3358BZCZ100); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAAAM-1MWT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = SMSC;LAN8710A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 54:4A:16
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.8.13-bone71.1;Debian 7.8;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Grove, GPIO, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217C;;1; ,,, Single Inverter Buffer Driver;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G06DCKR;;1; ,,, 500ma Low Noise Voltage Regulator;Texas Instruments;TL5209DR;;1; ,,, 32K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC32AT-I/OT;;1; ,,, Power Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2051BDGN;;1; ,,, 4 Channel ESD Solution for USB;Texas Instruments;TPD4S012DRYR;;2; ,,, Dual Buffer and Driver with 3-State Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN47LVC2G241DCUR;;1; ,,, Single Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC1G07DCKR;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.7.2 |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2015 |estprice = 39 |upc = 841454100409 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B014RE1OQI |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |multirev = Yes |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specification=== *Processor: ''[[TI]]'' Sitara AM3358BZCZ100 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :CPU Supports: NEON floating-point & 3D graphics accelerator *RAM: ''Micron'' 512MB DDR3L, Flash Storage: ''Micron'' 4GB eMMC *USB Host: 1x Micro USB, Supports powering & communications *Grove Connectors: 2x (One I2C and One UART) *GPIO: 2x 46-pin headers *Ethernet: 1x FE ports
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/BeagleBone_Green ''BeagleBone Green'' on '''SeeedStudio''' Wiki]
